org.openimaj.image.analysis.algorithm

Class ImageInterpolation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.analysis.algorithm.ImageInterpolation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageAnalyser<FImage>

    public class ImageInterpolation
extends Object
implements ImageAnalyser<FImage>
    An ImageAnalyser that can provide interpolate pixel values using a variety of interpolation approaches.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
